    • Method Detail

      • resolve

        public SerializerRegistry resolve(SerializableTypeResolver... resolvers)
        Resolves serializable types with the given resolver.

        This allows users to modify the serializable types registered to an existing Serializer instance. Types resolved by the provided resolver(s) will be added to existing types resolved by any type resolvers provided to this object's constructor or by previous calls to this method.

        Parameters:
        resolvers - The resolvers with which to resolve serializable types.
        Returns:
        The serializer registry instance.

      • resolve

        public SerializerRegistry resolve(Collection<SerializableTypeResolver> resolvers)
        Resolves serializable types with the given resolver.

        This allows users to modify the serializable types registered to an existing Serializer instance. Types resolved by the provided resolver(s) will be added to existing types resolved by any type resolvers provided to this object's constructor or by previous calls to this method.

        Parameters:
        resolvers - The resolvers with which to resolve serializable types.
        Returns:
        The serializer registry instance.

        Parameters:
        type - The type class.
        Returns:
        The serializer registry.
        Throws:
        RegistrationException - If the given type is already registered
